intro: Picturesque locations are waiting for you, filled with an atmosphere of relaxation.
description:
Explore cozy country clubs, parks, picturesque canyons and family holidays, enjoying every moment.
In this part of the series, you will find even more new places where you can test your skills in searching for objects and solving puzzles!

The collector's edition includes:
- 12 additional levels with unique hidden object scenes and mini-games.
- 8 exclusive mini-games from the previous installments.
- Souvenir Shop – collect unique trophies for achievements.

Leave the hustle and bustle of the city behind and embark on an exciting journey full of discoveries and vivid emotions.
